name: Eruption (itch) (Jadeskon)
description:
Oh Nooo!
The volcano will erupt soon!
Save as many people as you can, or sacrifice some of them to the volcano God to buy yourself more time. But watch out. The more people you carry the easier you will fall over.
You have to pick up the people and drive them to a rescue point (dock or airfield) or sacrifice them at top of vulcano to get more time. The closest rescue point, people and vulcano are shown by your compasses.
This game was developed by a group of seven people in total.
